content.rendered:
[vc_row class_row=”page–hasTop”][vc_column][vc_row_inner is_container=”true”][vc_column_inner el_class=”d-sm-block d-none” width=”1/3″ tablet_width=”1″]

/02
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″ tablet_width=”10″ phone_width=”12″]

Digital Products

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[vc_row_inner is_container=”true”][vc_column_inner el_class=”order-sm-0 order-2 ml-sm-0 ml-auto” width=”1/4″ desktop_width=”1″ tablet_width=”2″ phone_width=”6″][vc_column_text el_class=”desc__still text-sm-left text-right mp-0 js-animation–lines” offset_animation=”data-offset=“.2“” offset_onscreen_animation=”.4″]Bison®
services
/02[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”d-lg-block d-none” width=”1/4″ desktop_offset=”2″ desktop_width=”1″] [/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”order-sm-1 order-0 text-sm-left text-center services-section__desc mb-sm-0 mb-4″ width=”1/4″ desktop_offset=”2″ desktop_width=”5″ tablet_offset=”1″ tablet_width=”8″ phone_width=”12″][vc_column_text el_class=”desc__medium text-uppercase mp-0 js-animation–lines mb-2″ offset_animation=”data-offset=“.5“” offset_onscreen_animation=”.8″]We build digital platforms which are interactive, easy to use, and strategically designed. We never use design or technology just for the sack of it; everything we build is always with a purpose. We build for people.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”text-gray js-animation–fade b-strong–white” offset_animation=”data-offset=“.6“” offset_onscreen_animation=”1.2″]The digital products and services we build help brands establish new revenue channels and thrive with tomorrow in mind. We use product thinking that brings together design and technology to build value for your customers and business.

Our team of experienced developers build robust, scalable products using native development and a reliable tech stack, to deliver high quality, cost effective digital products. From mobile apps to interactive installations, we specialize in helping partners create digital platforms, services, and products that enhance and amplify their business offerings in groundbreaking ways.

Our process starts with clearly defining the consumer journey, your business objectives, and what’s happening today (with tomorrow in mind).[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”ml-sm-auto order-sm-2 order-1″ width=”1/4″ desktop_width=”auto” tablet_width=”auto” phone_width=”auto”]

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[vc_row_inner is_container=”true”][vc_column_inner]
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
[vc_row_inner is_container=”true” class_row=”mt-1″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ desktop_width=”2″ tablet_width=”3″ phone_width=”6″][vc_column_text el_class=”desc__still text-left mp-0 js-animation–lines”]/Bison Studio helps brands create digital products that their customers can’t live without/[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”ml-auto” width=”1/2″ desktop_offset=”3″ desktop_width=”6″ phone_width=”auto”]
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row is_container=”true”][vc_column width=”1/2″ desktop_width=”4″ tablet_width=”6″ phone_width=”12″ el_class=”mb-sm-0 mb-4″][vc_custom_heading text=”explore
the process” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”font-bold text-uppercase js-animation–chars”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ desktop_offset=”2″ desktop_width=”6″ tablet_width=”6″ phone_width=”12″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”mb-lg-0 mb-3″ width=”1/2″ desktop_width=”6″ phone_width=”12″]

1

Discover

We ask a lot of questions. And give you honest answers. Because only by understanding your challenges can we help you to overcome them.

We will talk to your target audience to discover what makes them tick, their motivations behind their actions and how their behaviour changes at each stage of their journey. We will also look to the wider industry, and further afield to ensure your innovation remains competitive and cutting edge.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”mb-lg-0 mb-3″ width=”1/2″ desktop_width=”6″ phone_width=”12″]

2

Test

After speaking with customers and stakeholders we create a proof of concept, with the data to back it up and the action plan to drive it forward.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”mb-lg-0 mb-3″ width=”1/2″ desktop_width=”6″ phone_width=”12″]

3

Develop

Working iteratively, we build and launch a viable product to market today, that’s built with tomorrow in mind.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ desktop_width=”6″ phone_width=”12″]

4

Scale

Using the latest live data we refine and optimise to create the ideal customer experience and deliver the best results.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner is_container=”true”][vc_column_inner]
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

featured works

/05

Mercury Towers – Interactive Sales Room

Bringing malta's largest real estate icon into an educational and immersive digital sales platform?

  • Digital Products

Bukkun

Malta’s first local food company for kids!

  • Digital Products
  • E-Commerce
[/vc_column][/vc_row]
